sense.def:
To redress something
pomeni narediti nekaj, da popravimo krivico ali trpljenje ljudi, ki so bili neupravičeno prizadeti;

seg.quote: He did all that he could to redress these wrongs.

sense.def:
Redress
je poplačilo za povzročeno krivico;

seg.quote: Your claims for redress may yet succeed.

sense.def:
To redress the balance between two unequal things
pomeni poskrbeti, da dve neenaki stvari spet postaneta enaki.

seg.quote: We were refused the pay increase needed to redress the balance.
